victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: He swept his match winning 3 sets in a row in the finals.
sentences.chinese: 在決賽中他以三連勝大敗對手。

sentences.english: The team recently re-take three in a row, confidence can be said that overflowed the.
sentences.chinese: 而球隊近期也再取三連勝，信心可以說是爆棚了。
